        public void goToLevel(int l,

      • findClosestRoomNodeInLevel

        private java.lang.String findClosestRoomNodeInLevel(float x,
                                                    float y)
        Same as findClosestRoomNodeInLevel(Coordinates, float). But Coordinates is created from x and y and radius is 100.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the center.
        y - The y coordinate of the center.
        Returns:
        Name of the Node closest to the center.

      • findClosestRoomNodeInLevel

        private java.lang.String findClosestRoomNodeInLevel(Coordinates c,
                                                    float radius)
        Returns the name of the Node closest to the c in circle whit the given radius. If there is no Node in the circle returns an empty String.
        Parameters:
        c - Center of the circle.
        Returns:
        Name of the Node closest to the center.

      • coordinatesToPointF

        private PointF coordinatesToPointF(Coordinates c)
        "Casts" Coordinates to PointF.

      • clickHere

        public java.lang.String clickHere(PointF f)
        First calls findClosestRoomNodeInLevel(float, float), if returns empty String, this function returns null. If not and a Route is shown, checks f with Node.isElavatorOrStairhouse(), if true displays the level tho which the Route leads. If false marks the Node as clicked
        Parameters:
        f - The point to investigate.
        Returns:
        The name returned by findClosestRoomNodeInLevel(float, float).

      • highlightRoom

        public void highlightRoom(java.lang.String name)
        Displays the level where the room is and scales on it. If name is null deselect selected room.
        Parameters:
        name -

      • showRoute

        public boolean showRoute(java.lang.String from,
                         java.lang.String to)
        Plans and displays the fastest Route between the Nodes to which the names refer.
        Returns:
        False if there exist no Route.

      • dontShowAnything

        public void dontShowAnything()
        Removes any kind of graphic from the picture.

      • toWhichFloorDoesItGo

        public int toWhichFloorDoesItGo(Node n)
        If a Route is displayed and the given Node is an elevator or stairhouse returns the level to which it leads on the Route. If there is no Route or n is not elevator or stairhouse returns the level of n.
        Parameters:
        n -
        Returns:
